snippet.title: Johnny Depp's friend's REVELATION: Amber Heard ruined his career and brought him to alcoholism
snippet.description:
The scandal surrounding the divorce of Johnny Depp and Amber Heard has not subsided since 2017. The ex-wife of the actor accuses him of domestic violence, after which Depp lost multimillion contacts and movie roles. The trials of former spouses do not stop to this day. Not so long ago it became known that a series of two episodes will be filmed about their divorce. The series will reveal a look at the problem from two sides - Amber Heard and Johnny Depp. The premiere is planned for the summer of 2022.

Johnny Depp's former colleague revealed some details of the upcoming documentary. According to him, it was Amber Heard who caused his addiction to psychoactive substances.

Musician Bill Hunty played with Johnny Depp in the 80s in the band The Kids. He claims that he tried to warn Depp against marrying Heard. It seemed to him that the actress was pursuing selfish goals in her relationship with Depp.

"She completely destroyed his career and his life. She got into his head and drove him crazy, in connection with this Johnny Depp began to use psychoactive substances, " says Depp's former colleague.
tags: Depp and Heard made a scandal
